title: This Is How She Fails
description: This Is How She Fails by Lisa J. Cihlar (CC#23), was published on May 8th, 2012, by Crisis Chronicles Press in northern Ohio. It's a cycle of more than two dozen prose poems - often haunting, always gorgeous - comprising 26 pages and featuring a white and dual blue cardstock cover with cover art by Lisa Marie Peaslee.
author: Lisa J. Cihlar
